pkgmetadata.longdescription: # xdg`xdg` has been renamed to `xdg-base-dirs` due to an import collision with[`PyXDG`](https://pypi.org/project/pyxdg/). Therefore the[`xdg`](https://pypi.org/project/xdg/) package is deprecated. Install[`xdg-base-dirs`](https://pypi.org/project/xdg-base-dirs/) instead.
